meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rick Ostrow Barbara Rose Stacie Macias Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1176.

td.p: Rick Ostrow, a publicist and freelance writer originally from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Barbara Rose, a teacher from Lander, Wyoming
Stacie Macias, a homemaker from Lake Elsinore, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $25,600)

tr.td: 7-LETTER WORDS
THEATERS
WORLD GEOGRAPHY
THE APOSTLES
POPULAR SONGS
APROXIMATE WEIGHTS & MEASURES

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Stacie: What is pontifex?)

pontiff (or primate)

StacieBarbara
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Stacie
Barbara
Rick

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [As the "Think!" music finishes and fades] All right, all three contestants appear to have completed their responses, so we\'ll begin down the line with Rick. He was in third place with $2,600.)
...
(Alex: [To Barbara] The only feature film that, I think, Disney produced in that year.)
RickWho was Dumbo?
$2,550
BarbaraWho was Pinochio
$4,200
StacieWHO IS PINOCCHIO?
$1,900
Pinocchio')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'This 1940 Disney title character wore a Tyrolean hat')

tr.td: DISNEY FEATURE FILMS
This 1940 Disney title character wore a Tyrolean hat
Stacie
Barbara
Rick
3-day champion: $34,200
2nd place: a trip to Freeport, the Bahamas via Delta Air Lines
3rd place: Pinseeker golf clubs + Nintendo Entertainment System with the Family & Junior Editions of Jeopardy! & Wheel of Fortune
Stacie
Barbara
Rick

20 R,
3 W
(including 1 DD)

12 R,
3 W
(including 2 DDs)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
